text: Vakkom Majeed (20 December 1909 â€“ 10 July 2000) was an Indian freedom fighter, politician and a former member of the Travancore-Cochin State Assembly.Pg 20, Who is who of freedom fighters in Kerala - K. Karunakaran Nair, 1975 He was born in Vakkom, Travancore, in the Madras Presidency of British India. He died in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala. == References == Category:People of British India Category:Indian National Congress politicians Category:Politicians from Kerala Category:1909 births Category:2000 deaths
title: Vakkom Majeed
